title: [Large-Scale] Goal-Oriented Physical Education Design for International Students

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary physical education experience and competency in online learning tools
context.additional_context: Emphasizes strengthening motivation for physical activity participation through goal-setting by novice learners, expanding cultural exchange experiences through sports. Real-time interaction and project-based assessments occur in digital device-supported environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply goal-oriented theory to specify individual/team short-term physical education goals within a week.
Learners can present cross-cultural understanding and communication experiences through sports activities as project deliverables.
Learners can share physical education goals and progress with peers using online collaboration tools and exchange feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
